help-file.title: "MUNDANE LIFE"
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all help available that deals with everyday life on the MUD. Type "help <entry>" for more information. An asterisk beside an entry indicates more help topics at that entry. Example: "help ships" will bring up an explanation on SHIPS, the different types to be found, and how to use them.
